= Introduction =

This list of features is used to make a fast test without administrative overhead.

= Features =

This list is all the features implemented into nDoctor:

 * *Patient data*
  * Save
  * Undo
  * Add
   * Doctor
   * Specialisation
   * Insurance
   * Reputation
   * Practice
   * Profession
 * *Medical records manager*
   * Records
    * Add
    * Update
   * Directory
    * Add
  * Macros
   * Add 
   * Update
   * Remove
